item.title: A super-quick way to speed up your containers on AWS
item.description: We all hate it when it happens. You know what I’m talking about – your app works perfectly fine locally, you deploy it… and then bam! In my case, I hit a terrible, terrible performance bottleneck. It all started when I was setting up a whole new service from scratch. A pretty standard container deployment, running on EC2 instances. Nothing too fancy, and it seemed everything went smooth. First version deployed.
